commands.name: az storage directory metadata show
commands.summary: Get all user-defined metadata for the specified directory.
commands.syntax:
az storage directory metadata show --name
                                   --share-name
                                   [--account-key]
                                   [--account-name]
                                   [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                                   [--backup-intent]
                                   [--connection-string]
                                   [--disallow-trailing-dot {false, true}]
                                   [--file-endpoint]
                                   [--sas-token]
                                   [--snapshot]
                                   [--timeout]

                                   [--timeout]

commands.name: az storage directory metadata update
commands.summary: Set one or more user-defined name-value pairs for the specified directory.
commands.syntax:
az storage directory metadata update --name
                                     --share-name
                                     [--account-key]
                                     [--account-name]
                                     [--auth-mode {key, login}]
                                     [--backup-intent]
                                     [--connection-string]
                                     [--disallow-trailing-dot {false, true}]
                                     [--file-endpoint]
                                     [--metadata]
                                     [--sas-token]
                                     [--snapshot]
                                     [--timeout]

                                     [--timeout]
